column4: please help!! for some reason ubuntu changed my partition table and now partition magic and other programs says there are errors!!! :(
I have faced a lot of problems with it
windows partition manager shows unnalocated spaces of 1 mb y both my disks!!
ubuntu is installed in other disk!!!
windows will not be able to access or recognise your ubuntu ext3 partitions
now i have both windows disk partition table with errors!
i don't understand why ubuntu changed things!
if you are able to access your data.., isn't it ok if you ignore the errors?
if partition are corrupted at some time they will fail!!
can i send you a pm?
